thread.title: BRIEF-Ingenious Ene-Carbon New Materials Group unit says lawsuit regarding loan disputes

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ingenious Ene-Carbon New Materials Group unit says lawsuit regarding loan disputes

organizations.name: ingenious ene-carbon new materials group co ltd

text:
Jan 10 (Reuters) - Ingenious Ene-Carbon New Materials Group Co Ltd
* Says branch of BANK OF PANJIN has filed a lawsuit again Panjin-based new energy tech firm and Shenyang-based real estate unit, claiming repayment of loan and interest
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/bRWMqz
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
